content: shawl is worked in one piece and back and forth in row turn after each row in st counts ch1 counts as 1 st 3-treble_crochet groups form granny st pattern alternate row of granny sts with straight treble_crochet row final row forms bobble border **measurements** approx 218 x 125cm after blocking **list of materials** **scheepjes whirl** 60% cotton 40% acrylic 215-225g/1000m -yarn a forbidden fuchsia x 1 yarn cake **scheepjes whirlette** 60% cotton 40% acrylic 100g/455m -yarn b 874 pomegranate x 1 yarn cake -3 5mm crochet hook *scheepjes pretty little things features three small weekend projects released every month the printed booklet features a knitting crochet and varying craft and is available via scheepjes retailers worldwide *
